add T.X Y int `tag`
add C var D = 1
add T type T1 = T
add T1 \
	type T2 = T
add x.go:/var/ /* hello */
add x.go // EOF
-- x.go --
package p

const C = 1

type T struct {
	X int
}
-- stdout --
diff old/x.go new/x.go
--- old/x.go
+++ new/x.go
@@ -2,6 +2,15 @@

 const C = 1

+var /* hello */
+D = 1
+
 type T struct {
 	X int
+	Y int `tag`
 }
+type T1 = T
+
+type T2 = T
+
+// EOF
